com.geom.database

Class Point2DDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geom.database.DAO<java.awt.geom.Point2D>
      • com.geom.database.Point2DDAO

  • public class Point2DDAO
extends DAO<java.awt.geom.Point2D>
    This class implements the specific layer to access the table 'Point' That specific table contains the points that form a geometric shape A 'Point' belongs to a Figure (geometric shapes). It is defined by :
    • id : the specific key of the length
    • x: the abscissa of a point
    • y: the ordinate of a point
    • id_figure : the ID of the figure to which the Point belongs to
    • num_point: a number to order the points (1st length, 2nd length,...) because a given figure is traveled according to a certain direction
    Author:
    Dasha
